price: Ili, imaju li oni saučesnike?! Pa neka saučesnike svoje dovedu ako govore istinu!
arabic: أَمۡ لَهُمۡ شُرَكَآءُ فَلۡيَأۡتُواْ بِشُرَكَآئِهِمۡ إِن كَانُواْ صَٰدِقِينَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: am lahum shurakāu falyatū bishurakāihim in kānū ṣādiqīna
